From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia


Upcoming American film by Osgood Perkins


LonglegsTeaser posterDirected byOsgood PerkinsWritten byOsgood PerkinsProduced by

CinematographyAndrés ArochiProductioncompanies

Distributed byNeonRelease date

Running time101 minutes[2]CountryUnited StatesLanguageEnglish
Longlegs is an upcoming American horror thriller film written and directed by Osgood Perkins.  It stars Maika Monroe, Nicolas Cage, Alicia Witt and Blair Underwood. The film is scheduled to be released by Neon on July 12, 2024.


Premise[edit]
Set in 1974, the film focuses on Lee Harker, a new FBI agent, who has been assigned to an unsolved case of a serial killer. As the investigation becomes more complicated with occult evidence uncovered, Harker realizes a personal link to the killer and must act quickly to prevent another family murder.[3]

Cast[edit]
Maika Monroe as Lee Harker
Nicolas Cage as the serial killer
Alicia Witt
Blair Underwood
Production[edit]
In November 2022, it was reported that Osgood Perkins would direct from a script he wrote.[4] Nicolas Cage signed on to produce (under his Saturn Films banner) and star in the horror thriller film as a serial killer.[3][5] In February 2023, Maika Monroe signed on as FBI agent, Lee Harker.[3] The following month, Alicia Witt and Blair Underwood joined the cast.[6]
Principal photography took place in Vancouver, British Columbia from January 16 to February 23, 2023, with Andrés Arochi serving as cinematographer.[7][5]

Release[edit]
In February 2023, Neon acquired the film's North American rights at the European Film Market.[8][9] It is scheduled to be released in the United States on July 12, 2024.[5]
